verses.verse: And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We will <S%H398>eat<s%> our own <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H3847>wear<s%> our own <S%H8071>apparel<s%>: only let us be <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>; take thou <S%H622>away<s%> our <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H6780>branch<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H6643>beautiful<s%> and <S%H3519>glorious<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H1347>excellent<s%> and comely <S%H8597>for<s%> them that are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7604>pass<s%>, that he that is left in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and he that <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, shall be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%>, even every one that is <S%H3789>written<s%> among the <S%H2416>living<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

when the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have washed <S%H7364>away<s%> the <S%H6675>filth<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and shall have <S%H1740>purged<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H7307>thereof<s%>, by the spirit of <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1197>burning<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H1254>create<s%> over the whole <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and over her <S%H4744>assemblies<s%>, a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H6227>smoke<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, and the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>; for over all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be spread a <S%H2646>covering<s%>.

And there shall be a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> for a <S%H6738>shade<s%> in the <S%H3119>day-time<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat<s%>, and for a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and for a <S%H4563>covert<s%> from <S%H2230>storm<s%> and from <S%H4306>rain<s%>.
